title: Cookie goes to hospital
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Children - Hospital care

Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television series
description: Episode of Series "The Kids of Degrassi Street". The kids of DeGrassi Street find themselves involved in another adventure when Cookie suddenly takes ill during a club meeting and is sent to hospital to have her appendix removed. Cookie is apprehensive of her first visit to hospital and asks her friends to get her doll from the club house. Provides an insight into hospital routines and operational procedures.
